chunk:
Simple Body Foaming Face Wash, Chamomile

Brand: Simple Body

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: aqua (WATER), anthemis nobilis L (CHAMOMILE) floral water, potassium sorbate, latic acid, coco glucoside, cocamidopropyl betaine, vegetable glycerin, dehydroacetic acid, benzyl alcohol, water, citric acid

Directions: Apply cleanser twice daily to your face using a silicone brush or hands using a
circular motion. Follow with toner or tonic, serums and moisturizers.

Warnings: A patch test for skin sensitivity is recommended. Discontinue use if irritation
occurs. If product comes in direct contact with eyes, rinse thoroughly with water. The safety
of this product has not been determined. For external use only.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
